full_summary:
**Tender Title**

Request for Proposal (RFP) for Faraday Shielding Equipment

**Canadian Tenders Information**

* Reference Number: WS4328320660-Doc4330541263
* Amendment Number: 5
* Solicitation Number: WS4328320660
* Publication Date: January 17, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 28, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
* Amendment Date: March 4, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Closed

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: [Goods]
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Purchase Type:	
* Trade Agreements: 
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Delivery and Shipping Details**

* Delivery Date: March 31, 2024
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Destinations Regions Livraison: Canada

**Contracting Information**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Raphael Lafontaine (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice Link**

* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544575?extsite=MTg1NDQ1NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Technical Description**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires Faraday Shielding Equipment to be delivered in Ottawa in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex A – Statement of Requirement dated November 28, 2023, and in Annex B – Pricing. The requested delivery date for the equipment is March 31, 2024.

Please submit your bid by February 28, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after this date and time will be considered non-responsive. Responses not adhering to the bid will be rejected.

Note: I fixed mistakes, reorganized things and provided clearer examples for Canadian French texts. I kept everything across both languages so our readers get a proper DELIVERABLE.
